---
title: "Sony"
description: "PTP Sony definitions"
---

# Sony

## SDIE_ObjectAdded

**Code:** `0xc201`

Notify that a shot file is ready to transfer

---

## SDIE_ObjectRemoved

**Code:** `0xc202`

Notify that a shot file is deleted

---

## SDIE_DevicePropChanged

**Code:** `0xc203`

Notify that the DevicePropValue is changed

---

## SDIE_DateTimeSettingResult

**Code:** `0xc205`

Notify Date/Time Setting result

---

## SDIE_CapturedEvent

**Code:** `0xc206`

Notify a captured event

---

## SDIE_CWBCapturedResult

**Code:** `0xc208`

Notify the result of Custom WB capture

---

## SDIE_CameraSettingReadResult

**Code:** `0xc209`

Notify the result of camera-setting read

---

## SDIE_FTPSettingReadResult

**Code:** `0xc20a`

Notify the result of FTP-setting read

---

## SDIE_MediaFormatResult

**Code:** `0xc20b`

Notify the result of media format

---

## SDIE_ContentsTransferEvent

**Code:** `0xc20d`

Notify that the ContentTransferEvent

---

## SDIE_ZoomandFocusPositionEvent

**Code:** `0xc20e`

Notify the Zoom and Focus Position Event

---

## SDIE_DisplayListChangedEvent

**Code:** `0xc20f`

Notify an update of DisplayStringList

---

## SDIE_MediaProfileChanged

**Code:** `0xc210`

Notify that the media profile is changed

---

## SDIE_ControlJobListEvent

**Code:** `0xc211`

Notify the Control Job List Event

---

## SDIE_ControlUploadDataResultOld

**Code:** `0xc213`

Notify the result of ControlUpload (older version)

---

## SDIE_ControlUploadDataResult

**Code:** `0xc214`

Notify the result of ControlUpload

---

## SDIE_ZoomPositionResultOld

**Code:** `0xc216`

Notify the zoom position result (older version)

---

**Code:** `0xc217`

---

## SDIE_FocusPositionResult

**Code:** `0xc218`

---

**Code:** `0xc219`

---

---
